content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my backyard as i always do after work every night looking up at the stars. i was enjoying the clear night and a sky with no regular aircraft in site. i was looking due west approximately what i thought was about 9 or 10 0'clock. and i saw what i thought at first was a reflection of one of those spotlights that are used at special events or airports. then it moved closer and i could see a series of lights with equal amounts of separation. it had a slight bend in the formation, and it didn't move sqaurley from the apex of the curve, it moved at an angle.With all the lights following in line with the lead light.If i had to put a size on what the mass would be i would say it could have been a mile or two wide. though i couldn't see mass just a row of lights i felt it was one solid object.It moved from the northwest to the southeast. i felt in awe and completely convinced that it was a full blown ufo as i have spent a lot of time looking up at the night sky and i have definitely never seen anything that was as fantastic a site as this thing was. this isn't the first ufo i have seen so i didn't get overly exited but it was thrilling. i watched it go out of site moving to the southwest
content.summary: A string of lights with about a 20 degree curve [ 15 to 20 ] moved at what seemed like a high altitude and at a very smooth high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: The description is in romanian language because is easier for me to describe with details and without any error. please find someone to translate propely this text. faceam, impreuna cu cumnatul meu, poze lunii pline cand vazand in directia opusa muntii fagaras usor luminati de lumina lunii ce se ridica, am incercat sa fac o poza nocturna de pe trepied cu expunere mai lunga catre munti. am tras cam 3 cadre in care, in timpul expunerilor, discutam cu cumnatul meu care, cu un aparat mai putin performant, se straduia sa surprinda luna satisfacator. dupa fiecare cadru luat muntilor am verificat ceea ce am obtinut iar la una dintre ele am remarcat o mica dara luminoasa pe care am considerat-o atunci ca fiind probabil vreo stea si considerand reflex poza probabil "miscata" din greseala am mai facut cel putin o poza in speranta de a prinde poze cat mai clare. tin minte ca discutam cu cumnatul meu despre faptul ca totusi ma mir ca am prins o lumina de stea pentru ca cu ochiul liber nu se vedeau stele deasupra muntilor insa nu am dat mai mult atentie chestiei. insa retin faptul ca lumina lunii (care se tot ridica de la orizont) crestea asa incat si stelele care se vedeau in mod curent deveneau destul de putin vizibile. la foarte scurta vreme am auzit un zgomot ca de avion apropiindu-se. fiindca se auzea destul de tare, fata de felul cum se aud cele care trec frecvent deasupra zonei unde locuiesc, am cautat din priviri in sus sa localizez sursa acelui sunet. atunci am remarcat faptul ca nu se vad luminile pe care in mod obisnuit le pot vedea la avioanele de linie care strabat, la altitudine mare, din diverse directii zona de domiciliu. avand aparatul pe trepied, l-a decuplat rapid si din mana am incercat sa prind cateva cadre cu acele lumini dar, pentru ca foloseam un obiectiv de zoom insa destul de nepotrivit pentru capturi ale unor obiecte insuficient luminate, am avut o oarecare intarziere a prinderii in cadru a acelor lumini. poza surprinsa mi-a ridicat mai multe intrebari intrucat apar lumini cu dare cauzate de miscarea naturala a mainii la zoom maxim dar si lumini si dare absolut deloc "miscate" in acelasi timp. iar luminile "miscate" par sa fie sub celelalte care sunt "nemiscate". pot afirma dupa sunet ca a fost cel putin un avion implicat in aceasta experienta insa dupa numarul luminilor albe precum si dupa taria si felul sunelelor auzite as inclina sa cred ca a fost vorba probabil de doua avioane. si nu cred ca erau de linie pentru ca pareau a fi mult mai jos decat cele care, cum spuneam, survoleaza frecvent zona de la mare inaltime in diversele lor rute. insa separat de acele sunete specifice de avion nu pot afirma clar daca se mai auzea inca altceva intrucat atentia mea era in acele secunde spre capturarea de imagini cat mai repede posibil pana sa de indeparteze. insa am retinut cert faptul ca am remarcat mai multe lumini decat in mod obisnuit si nu toate pulsand. cele rosii pareau si mai mari decat cele albe, nici nu pulsau si cand le-am vazut prima data pareau a fi a o scurta distanta de cele albe (aveau un mic avans fata de ele) cand am reusit sa prind in obiectiv luminile respective trecusera deja peste vertical locului unde eram eu asa incat le-am prins oarecumva putin din urma lor. cand am descarcat pozele pe calculator si le-am studiat am remarcat faptul ca si poza cu peisajul montan nu e una miscata si mai mult m-a mirat faptul ca, la o prelucrare simplista a pozei in sensul aplicarii unui surplus de luminozitate, se observa faptul ca norii slabi prezenti deasupra muntilor erau mai luminati in zona acelei dare de lumina. adica dara de lumina era pozitionata intre munti si norii destul de josi. si mai mult, nu putea fi o stea asa mare comparativ cu muntii si nici nu putea sa se deplaseze aparent asa mult in intervalul de timp in care am tras cadrul. mai multe despre experienta asta nu stiu ce sa va spun insa m-as bucura daca m-ati oferi o explicatie logica intrucat cei cu care m-am sfatuit nu au reusit sa explice poza in mod multumitor. pozele atasate sunt cele originale (cele mari) si cele mai mici sunt decupari din cele mari la care le-am aplicat strict un surplus de lumina (uniform in toata poza)pentru a vedea mai clar ce anume e acolo.
content.summary: Very strange

content.detailedDescription:
A interview that i gave about this object seen in erie, pa 11:20pm 11-5-13.
-viewer was in suburb of erie. object was south of him. he said it was way up in the sky. he had to tilt his head back to take the pic. the angle was similar to if the object were 10 ft. above the building next to his house. it was a cloudy night. the object appeared to be high, but below the clouds. 
-called 911. they had received no reports. they said to call the airport.
-airport didn't answer that night. when called the next morning, they said that there were no reports of anything unusual on the radar.
-viewer thought it appeared to be as big as two football fields the brightness of the object was very bright. viewer visually boxed it in making a frame with his thumb and forefinger about a foot from his face. said it measured approx. 3��� within that box.
-picture was shot with canon gl2. second, brighter, picture was enhanced.
-object appeared to be completely motionless, like a picture held up in the sky.
-duration of event was approx. 8 minutes. he just stared at it at first. then he went inside and got his camera, and it was still there, unmoved, when he returned. went back inside to get a video cassette, and when he returned, it was gone. 
-thoroughly checked the area in daylight to be certain that it hadn't been something that is always there, but was temporarily lit.
content.summary: Seen i extremity bright white light!  very big in size

content.detailedDescription: My family (mom, two kids and myself) were driving to a store (target). on our way to the store we noticed lights in the sky. i thought it was fireworks. then, i noticed that the lights were not disappearing. instead they were moving across the sky. they were about 50-60 together. they were moving in a partner similar to the one birds move together when they migrate. i pulled over and got off the car. many people did the same thing. i tried to record but my phone was not good enough. i stayed out the car seen the flying lights crossing the sky. then, they all stopped on top of the town and two of them descended. i wanted to see where they were going but my mom got really nervous and asked me to go inside the car. we went to the store and when we drove home the objects were gone.
content.summary: Flying objects in the sky (like balls)

content.detailedDescription:
Strange last night i was listening to ufo story of stan romanack and he spoke of red ball ufo.  i had never heard of these before.  i am a believer.
today my daughter was walking home from bus and saw red ball in sky flying faster than a jet behind her.  she was able to take picture with iphone.
but like camera phones image small. she said it was like penny size in sky.  she came running in house freaked out.  we both ran back out and saw it flying away.
earlier in day helicopters were noticed when i was walking dog.  and after sighting police were driving slow in neighbor hood, even parked infort on neighbors house for about 10 minutes and left without getting out of car..  they never drive down our street has a dead end.
content.summary: Red ball flying fast like jet

content.detailedDescription: About 11:10 am on nov. 6th.(wed) 2013.. i was at work and go outside to take a 5 min break to make a phone call, very bright sun to the east, to the right of the sun, very far away, i can see a plane flying away from my location, (very high in the air, can see the vapor trails it makes and the shape of the plane). not a cloud in the sky, about 55/60 degrees, light wind from the east.. i put my hand up to block the sun from my eyes... and saw a very bright white starlike and starshaped, glowing shape...At first i thought it was a reflection from the sun in my eyes... but i started to see the object move away from the sun (it was very high in altitude) the object was moving in a straight line in very incredible fast speed  (by the distance it was in the air, and looking back at the plane, i knew it was not a man made object, the plane was moving slow, and leaving a trail behind, this object was not)  i watched the object move incredibly fast towards the northwest, (from my location, it was traveling in the direction towards the akron/canton area (ohio)....I watched the object for about 25 seconds, and was pointing at it with my finger and from where i was, from the location and distance away from the object, i knew it was not man made... it was not a plane or satilite, it was moving way to fast and in a straight line... after about 25 seconds, it faded into the blue sky... the hair on my neck stood up, and i had a very big chill down my back..After seeing this, i got very excited, my throat tightened up, more chills up and down my body... and i started to say out loud  "yes yes yes!! finally! i got to see my first ufo sighting!!!  i can scratch that off of my bucket list!!"  i will never forget this day!!   i went back into the door of work, and the other employee was comming out, and i told him. we went back outside, and no visible sight of the object....   hope i see more, i said to him!!  he smiled and we went back to work...
content.summary: Very bright starlike moving extremely fast away from sun and plane going northwest..Faded out of sight  into blue sky

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine called me and told me that she sees some weird in the sky like a ufo. so i said take a picture of it and she did take two through the front windshield. later that knight she calls me again and said she sees a weird object again this time it was knight time. again i told her to take a picture and she did. the pictures were made with here cell phone camera. she sent them to me on my phone and i really couldn't see anything on my phone. months went by and i didn't think about them until i was deleting picture off my phone when i came across them and decided to take a better look at them. after sending the to my computer and blowing them up i was stunned at what i saw.
content.summary: The most briliant green object i have ever seen.

content.detailedDescription:
at the time i in lived in an apartment, 2 story walk-up.  i was working in the airline industry.
date: it was a typical late fall/early winter day in southern florida...Brilliantly clear with only a few white clouds in the sky.
my front door faced east on the second floor...I had a "panoramic or unobstructed view" of the sky.  as i exited my apartment out of the corner of my eye, i noticed something "odd" in the sky.  i looked over, in a southeasterly direction and saw a "black squeakly vertical line" in the sky at about 10,000 feet.  the "black squeakly line"  was about 50-75 ft. long.

next was unbelieveable.

out of the black squeakly "wormhole" line, emerged  a tubular shaped ufo.  the ufo was very shiny silver in color.
ufo slightly "bulged" in the middle area of the tubular shape.
ufo was flat at the front and flat at the rear...No wings, no tail no appendages.
ufo was black on the front, flat area.
from the rear of the tublar ufo emerged brown, billowing, billowing smoke.
the smoke did not correspond to the speed of the ufo...It was very "odd".
the ufo was estimated to be 50-75 feet long and 25-30 feet across
the ufo moved in a directly north directiion as it and the smoke emerged from "wormhole" , after it and the smoke emerged from the vertical black wormhole, for about 1 mile or so, then made a sharp turn to the east for about 2-3 miles, then turned sharply to the south and coninued.

this "black wormhole" was not as portrayed on televison..As  "circular"
in shape...But a vertical, black squeakly line...It disappeared after ufo emerged out of it !!!

the movement of the tubular shaped ufo was very, very, very odd.  it's movement was if the ufo was "floating on water"  or  being "manipulated" with "strings" like a puppet.  i would say its movement was a couple hundred miles per hour.

i ran inside my apartment and grabbed my inexpensive camera...Took a couple of photos.  by the time i returned outside the "smoke trail was still  there...Visible in photo", but the tubular ufo was either too far away by now or not visible to the naked eye in the photos...But  what was visible in the photo but not to the visible eye...A blurry, angled at 45 degree line is visible in the center of the photo , lower and closer than the original ufo.
at the time, i did send a photo copy to local mufon person.

i reported another very interesting ufo sighting to mufon report #45604, plus  have an interesting small blog on google titled; ufo over homestead, florida, new years eve 2012...Actual date was 12.31.2012 at about 8:50 pm few hours before 01.01.2013 east time,...That is " really" shocking also....
content.summary: Shiny/ silver ufo emerged from "black squeakly line...Wormhole" over palmetto bay, florida   !!!

content.detailedDescription: I was in leakey, tx visiting for a couple days and decided to take a picture of the sunset on the evening of october 23, 2013.  as i was taking the pic i noticed a cigar translucent shaped object hovering in the distance.  i immediately took a picture of the object and it hovered in the same spot for about 5 minutes then just vanished in thin air.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the sunset when i noticed a strange hovering translucent object.  i took photo  and i then just vanished or disapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting 1 - 11/3/13 between 6:15 - 6:30pm est.  i first noticed an extremely bright white light over the dayton mall area while driving home.  once i arrived, i got out the binoculars and observed this was no airplane or helicoptor.  it was quite large and changed shape.  it changed between a mushroom shape and a circular shape with a definitive pattern inside.  the pattern had a large circle in the middle with smaller circles radiating out like spokes on a wheel.  there was no sound heard.

sighting 2 - 11/5/13 between 6:15 - 6:30pm est.  i was outside seeing my wife off to work and then moving my car into the driveway,when there it was again.  an extremely bright white light in the same vicinity.  i got out the binoculars again and saw the samething.  this time i got the camera.  it is a nikon cool pix with a 15x wide optical zoom.  what i saw through the camera was completely different to what i saw with the binocs.  it looked like two soup laddles tied togther, kind of like the shape of an 8 and it was slowly tumbling end over end.  the pics however came out like squiggly lines.  it moved away in a sw direction.  no sound heard.
content.summary: Miamisburg ufo seen 2 nights

content.detailedDescription: Large object that i see almost every night.  it's very big and bright and sometimes can be seen in other areas of the sky.  it appears and disappears out of nowhere.  it hovers in one spot as planes fly by.  it's brightness is what made me notice it.  it has been there for months now around the same time every night.
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription: Several sets of triangular shaped lights, all of which had various sizes, moving very slowly across the sky as if to avoid detection. appeared at first to be stars. was sitting in the park when i first noticed them.
content.summary: Several triangular sets of lights moving very slowly

content.detailedDescription: Laying in my bed looking out window when a bright glowing orb appeared then changed to a black dome with various lights blinking around it. made no sound at all and had odd flight pattern and went in different directions at a rapid rate.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Deffinitly not normal and had other strange events. cat acted weird.

content.detailedDescription:
I haven seen these on more than one occasion... i started seeing them around march of this year (20130 and at first i thought i was just seeing things. the first one i saw stayed in the same exact spot and just pulsated for exactly three hours,  i have seen at least 30 since.

today 11/5 driving home from work on 75 south i saw a bright light in the sky around 6:00pm it was very faint at first but as i kept going down the highway it got brighter and closer. i was stuck in traffic and i notice there were three total.. i watched in amazement as no one else around me paid any attention to it. 

from a far it looks like a big white light but to the naked eye and when flying over you, you can 100% tell it's an aircraft of some kind. 

it get's even crazier... 

i have taken over four videos of great footage and up close shots, i watch them record and when i go to watch them they're gone as if i never video taped anything at all. the first time it happen i let it go thinking it was my mistake but the second time it happen i threw change out the window. 

it's crazy that people shut their eyes to this and don't pay attention to their surroundings. 

i will submit the photos and videos i have been able to capture!
content.summary: Newport ky & downtown cincinnati sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back patio. our house is on a canal and there is an empty lot across the canal. in the sky above the lot aprox. a mile away at aprox. 150 ft high i observed what appeared at first to be a plane. it suddenly changed direction and went the other way. i immediately  realized that it was no normal flight pattern and observed it closely as it again changed direction, smoothly changing between red, blue, and green. as i observed it closer i realized it was much closer than i first thought, maybe a mile away at about 150 ft. it kept up this back and forth pattern for about 2.5 mins while it changed colors. it dipped down once while we watched then again behind the tree line. that was the last we saw of it.
content.summary: Light changed from blue,red,green. changed direction smoothly

content.detailedDescription: Taking the dogs out to go to the bathroom when my boyfriend called out that he seen a ufo ..( we see them all the time) we watched it move in a straight path north and then north west and we watched it stop in between two stars and then after a few seconds starts to very very slowly move downwards and as it does it gets dimmer and dimmer until we couldn't see it anymore.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Standing outside seen a starlike object moveing north north west it stopped in between two stars and brightened then very very slowly started to descend and dim out to nothing

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on brookhaven road. i was waiting at the traffic light at brookhaven road and rt 352. i saw what i thought was an airplane but it was reflecting the sunlight brilliantly. it looked cylindrical and closely resembled an airplane, but do to the reflection, i coudnt make out exact geometric shapes i.E. i dont know if it had wings. i observed this very quickly. i looked down at my cell phone for a about 1-2 seconds and when i looked up, the object was gone. there were some clouds in the sky, but not to the extent that i would describe the sky as "partly cloudy." the object was below the clouds when i first observed it moving east to west. it did not disappear into the clouds. it just simply vanished. i scanned the sky sweeping as far as to the west that i could - and the object wasgone
content.summary: I saw a slow moving silver object moving east to west and then it vanished.

content.detailedDescription: On the eve of nov. 2 2013, i was at my girlfriends apt. helping her move. i stepped out onto the patio, located on the second floor, to take a smoke break, looking out over the pond and skyline, out of nothing just suddenly appeared these orange kinda red, lights? or balls in the sky jst above skyline as in straight ahead! these lights did not appear to shine? or glow? or even project light?  they just were there.  as like a ball of color?  there were four, moving like in a horizontal line? yet idependent? maybe a mile away or so? yet balls of light were like the size of a penny or nickel?  large, 4 large lights slowly rotating into position falling straight down... i started beating on the glass door and yelling for my girlfriend to come quickly! and she did. i grabbed my cell phone to get a pic. it was 9:02pm my girl asked wow what is it? and got her cell out with video to film but only got a glimps on film and us yelling and talking,   as these lights went more into a line across it appeared to me the object was rectangle or triangle but flat? not positive , but seemed to point down at like a 45deg. angle tilt, then level up and hover a min.  and then slowly started moving and flew away slowly heading to the south or south east, i got up and even stood on her patio chair to watch every sec. i could see as it dissapeared toward a small town of springboro, ohio. we were so confused at what we saw we contacted chan. 7 news and they said nothing reported yet? my girl called the write brother airport, that is that direction. the emergency on call person tells her that it is closed and no one there as of 8pm !Later that eve the maintenance supervisor who lives next door to her comes outside and i tell him what we saw, he must have went inside to tell his wife and teenage daughter, who looked at eachother and said see dad we told you!? several nights prior come to find out his wife and kid saw the same or very similar thing! and it scared them to go back inside, this being weird as it is now 4 of us have seen this, the next day i tell my boss the story, and he jst looked and said remember me telling you what me and my wife saw a month ago? ! same thing ! or very close to it and close to same area! when he told me i never really paid much thought to it of course? ufo ? ya right? sure? hahaha.. this now makes 3 couples 3 separate times all same locations or within a few miles, only my boss and wife were on motorcycle, the lights appeared in front of them, as they watched and rounded a turn they jst vanished.. only to reappear min later in totally op direction!! south dayton, ohio.  none of us know what we saw and are making no claims to what it is.   but it is something. and its very real ! 6 of us seen this 3 separate times. anyone with any information please let us know. now i cant stop thinking, or looking, yet afraid to tell anyone, because like me i didn't listen or think  ya right, your crazy...
content.summary: Standing on second floor patio taking a break, lights jst suddenly appeard out of nothing? these very large lights slowly decended, then started moving , i started yelling for girlfriend to come witness this and her jaw dropped.

content.detailedDescription:
After my first ufo sighting in 1978 i soon forgot all about it.  in 1995 i had a relative short encounter with aliens.

i had my nightlight on as i fell to sleep facing my open window.  at around 1:30 am i became aware of myself lightly dreaming seeing gray clouds.  i then opened my eyes and realized i could not move my toes or anything else, except for my eyes and head.  managing to rool over on my back i saw up against my closet an orange grey, and 3' from it an alien i later found out to be called, "god mars".  i kept staring at the orange grey in disbelief as how it could be orange noticing its eyes were a lighter shade orange.  when i first looked at "god mars" being all pure white with radiation moving on its body it projected a 6" white aura onto my bedroom door for 3 seconds then the aura went back into him.  both entities were perfectly still, as they each had a round foot long 3/8ths of an inch white enamel stick in front of them.  neither one touched the sticks.  the sticks were upright on a foot wide wooden counter that stretched out in front of them.  the counter was waist high to the entities.  "god mars" had a small head with small round eyes, and huge rounded shoulders.

when i looked away from the entities i became aware of one inch long lines hooked on to the backs of my head near my ears.  then i realized the lines being thinner than a hair was the source of why i could not move.  and then i realized the sides of my head feeling bloated.  then looking back at the entities i soon heard a loud motor sound coming from them, and towards my bed.  in panic i screamed as loud as i could three times.  when i screamed the third time, with my eyes closed, moving my head from side-to-side i noticed everything was gone when i opened my eyes.  at this time i was kicking my legs and moving my arms.  i went right to sleep.

9 months later i found a website that mentioned orange grey.  otherwise i never heard of one, and years later i bought 2 dvds that show the entity i encountered called, "god mars".  it is engraged on a boulder in a foriegn country and said to have great knowledge.  i recognized the small head a huge rounded shoulders.

attached are all my ufo sightings and alien abduction, encounter experiences.  i might have sent you the document before, but just to make sure.  you might find it beneficial in your research.  thank you.
content.summary: The first time i saw an orange grey and god mars.

content.detailedDescription:
Within in the felton,pa. area began seeing abnormal light groups. having 23 years of aviation experience, began to question the source or object. 3 nov 2013, notice a bright light that stayed stationary for extended periods of time. i traveled to a higher elevation to find that with the visual horizon of the skyline, 8 additional lights were observed. each appeared to be less than a 1000 ft about ground level, in a radius perimeter expanding over the entire field of view of approximately 270 degrees. the lights would intensify becoming extremely bright for a short periods of time as the objects remained stationary. as the object dimmed, the lights were in a triangular shape vertically. a brief description would be if 3 incandescent light bulbs were stacked horizontally. driving towards the source, the lights would vanish. twice on the evening of 3 nov, once in the location of the object, the source of the illumination went off, revealing an aircraft. i exited my vehicle in an attempt to listen as it flew directly over head less the 500ft above ground level. the normal position markers and anti collision light were observed but the craft was practical silent. if not straining to hear the power source, if would have easily passed unnoticed. i can not express completely in detail the coloration changes of the lights from each of the craft observed. 
4 nov 2013, i spoke to friends within the aviation community, although none doubted what i described, none of us could come up with a logical explanation. on this same evening, 3 of us travelled to the high point field of few which i witnessed the activity the night before. by 6pm, the craft were back within the same areas. with the vehicle parked, and lights off , we just observed the activities. attempts were made to capture on video. once viewed, its just not enough detail. we all agree that whatever the source of the lights, it is high energy. no light beams, or spot lights, but more of a intense glow of variable colors. the most visible activity is between 5:30pm and 8:00pm. within the course of our observation, once again, a craft few directly over head, emitting practically zero sound. one personal belief is these may be drone aircraft. prior manufactured drone aircraft could not remain stationary due to being prop driven. now, drone aircraft do have the ability to remain stationary and are of a rotor wing design. the this being a plausible explanation as what the craft may be, the next question is why are they there and what are they doing ? we search the web for more answers a came upon this site. seeing the many have described similar sitings, we thought this is the place to post our story. we are going back to the same point tonight being 5 nov to watch what we consider the unknown. if anyone else witnesses this type of light, be sure to look for others. i was actually shocked to see how many were actually seen at one time. ten of us will be there tonight. i must say, the one of the observers that was along 4 nov, has stated she will not go back to watch due to fear of what was seen, and possibly being seen. more to come !
content.summary: Light appear, deminish to being off, then reappear

content.detailedDescription: Several witnesses claim seeing this, as well as helicopters and jets, possibly shooting at this as well.
content.summary: Glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: I saw a triangle object move to my west. it was white, with green light around it, under it was a whit, blue, and red light. it move about 35 miles per hr. it was the size of a toyoto cambry. it was amazing. it lasted for a good 2 minutes.
content.summary: Saw a triangle object-revolve as it was moving. white,green aroung it, with white, green, and red lights under it.

content.detailedDescription: I could see out my window at 5:30am a huge, glowing oblong or tear-shaped orb that i knew after a second couldn't be a star. my mind tried to identify it as a planet and a star lined up among other things that might be brighter than a star, then it vanished and i could see what looked like an airplane flying from around that area - unsure now whether that small craft was the glowing orb changed, came from the orb, or just a bystander airplane. i only saw a few minutes tops of this, i have no idea how long the huge glowing object was in the sky.
content.summary: Huge glowing light, goes out and either that or airplane seen leaving area

content.detailedDescription:
On nov 4th, 2013 approximately around 2100 hrs. west coast pacific time, i was sitting on my front porch smoking a cigarette facing the east looking at the stars. i noticed a bright red "star" looking object which at the time i thought might have been the planet mars. for the next minute or so i noticed the object moving slowly to the ne. i then got up and quickly retrieved my binoculars from the trunk of my parked car near-by. i then lined the object up in the night sky and it suddenly and quickly morphed into a very large boomerang shaped single wing aircraft with two lights, one under each wing. red light on the port side wing and a white light on the starboard side. both rectangular in shape. this craft made no noise at all until the vehicle was closer to our residence to the nw. the noise sounded like a low humming, muffled jet engine. 
    then almost immediately a small regular type "airplane" appeared from the se in almost the first crafts initial direct flight path as if to follow it and/or intercept the larger. when this seemingly "cat chase" ensued the first-larger aircraft increased flight speed and swiftly flew off in to the western sky's out of sight with the smaller aircraft continuing to follow until both were out of my sight approximately 2115 hrs. this statement is true and correct to the best of my recollection.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: sitting out side on front porch smoking a facing e. noticed red star what i thought was mars object slowly floating nw then got binoculars saw boomerang shaped craft with red/white lights under wings second airplane entered airspace chased craft out area

content.detailedDescription:
On 11-2-13 at approx. 11:00 pm i was walking my dog near my house in a residential area with my 6 year-old daughter. i looked east and saw a bright reddish orange sphere object about 45 degrees above the horizon. i thought this was a very strange object because it just floated and did not move. it then moved very slowly in a south direction. it then turned and went slightly north and then went east picking up speed and then out of view blocked by rooftops. it didn't shoot away quickly it just seemed to accelerate smoothly but at a moderate pace. my daughter and i saw it for about one minute. i could tell it was very close and low by how fast it dropped over the horizon behind the rooftop. it was definitely not a plane and i thought maybe it was a floating chinese lantern because of the way it glowed and changed colors from red to orange and appeared to float but it did not move with the wind but changed directions. 

we continued looking for several minutes and it suddenly appeared again near the original location. it seemed to just appear and it may have been a second orb because the first was pretty far away when i last saw it but i only saw one at a time. this time it was not as bright. i ran back to my house which was only a few doors away and got my video camera and told my 11 year-old what we saw. we went back and it was not there. we waited about five minutes and it appeared briefly for about one minute near the original location but the lights then went out or it left quickly. i believe it went east but i was looking through my video camera and lost sight of it. i got a brief video but it was not very good because my dog was pulling on me. we waited about five more minutes and did not see it again and went home. we were all quite excited as this is the first ufo we've have ever seen. i say that because this was unlike anything i've ever seen.

when we arrived home, i went upstairs in our two-story home and opened the blinds and looked out a large east window for about ten minutes hoping to see it again but saw nothing and figured the event was over. i left for only about one minute and decided to check one last time and close the blinds and i was shocked to see it right in front of the house at about a 60 degree angle, much closer than the first two times. this time it was very bright because it was very close. i do not know how it got there that quick because i was only gone for a minute. my daughter was on the telephone telling her friend about it who lives a short distance away and told her we are seeing it again and to go outside.  i ran outside and began videoing it. my two daughters and wife came and they witnessed it. my daughter also took an image of it with her tablet. it remained still for about 20 seconds and then moved slowly in a southerly direction pulsating its colors with various shades of orange and red sort of like a fire. it was an orb shape but seemed to change shape slightly with the bright glow around it. it flickered a few times getting dim and then would get bright again. it continued moving in a southerly direction and got very dim either because it sped up going away from me or just shut off and then it was gone last seen going south. this viewing lasted about three minutes. i estimated it was about 500 to 1000 feet in altitude. i estimated the size to be about 10 to 20 feet in diameter. it was silent with no sounds or noise emitting from it.

i googled "red orb over discovery bay" and found two reports this year, one with video and the video was exactly the same type of object we saw. other searches revealed reddish orange orbs to be a common ufo phenomena in recent years. can't say it was extraterrestrial but it appeared to be controlled based on its movement and was unlike anything i've ever seen. i called two sheriff's offices since i live near the border of two counties and they had not received any reports. i called two local papers and they had no reports. i'm sure others must have seen this since it was so bright and unusual and this is a populated residential area. i will post the video on youtube and here which is okay quality but i used too much telephoto but you can clearly see it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Reddish orange sphere moving slowly in different directions changing colors and then going black

content.detailedDescription: My wife and mother in law pulled in the driveway and discovered the lights. wife says 2 red lights with a white line between them.  she pointed north over trees.  mother-in-law witnessed same event.   they watched it for 15-20 minutes.  said there was no sound.  i got a call at 11:18 pm saying come see this.  from my driveway through the trees the lights were 2-2.5" apart when i held my hand up in front of me.  only reference i could think of.  3 minutes later it was close to treetops on the horizon and i measured 1/2 to 1 inch on my finger.  when i saw the lights i only ever saw flashing or strobing.  wife and mom in law saw solid light and flashing/strobing lights.  i heard no sound while outside watching this.  they saw more than i did and said they heard nothing the entire time.  if looking at a map of hayesville  imagine the lights coming down hwy 69 near the state line then moving east towards the clay county rec park.  it seemed slow moving while i watched.  we do have aircraft fly overhead here normally.  but this was different.  i will keep my eyes peeled tomorrow and will have camera ready.
content.summary: Personally witnessed the last 3 minutes of lights.  saw red and white flashing.  from my driveway to treetops on horizon were1 inch apart.

content.detailedDescription: My dog has a sensitivity to ufo's. i think it is a high pitched sound they emit that only dogs can hear. tonight between 8:30 pm and 10:30 pm my dog would sit and whine and look skyward whether indoors or outside. its a cloudy night so we could not see what was going on up in the sky southwest of us a little ways but there was a red glow to the clouds in one spot in the sky. a little after he quit whining we took him for his nightly walk the red glow was gone from the clouds. we have had some troubles with strange ufo's in the area one was destroyed about month ago with the local ufo and two friends he called in when he couldn't get the other strange one to back off, the three of them combined their weapons and destroyed the stranger. i hope that was not being repeated tonight. since it was cloudy there is no telling what was going on.
content.summary: My ufo hunting dog reacting to event on cloudy night

content.detailedDescription: my dog has a tendency to sit and whine while looking skyward when a ufo is in the area. tonight for two hours whether inside or outside of our house he sat and whined at the sky or the ceiling inside the house. we had a cloudy night tonight and we could not see what he was reacting too, but what ever it was it was a signefagent amount of time for what ever was happening up in the sky above the could be going on there. he must hear a sound out of human hearing range is why i think he whines at them. the dogs are known for their hearing range for high pitch sounds.
content.summary: Cloudy night all i could see was a glow in sw sky

content.detailedDescription: It was so close only about 20 foot away it is a pulsating light small orange but red / orange round orb light anyway i went outside for smokes and then seen somehow these flashes they are red/orange very bright and this is not a prank i had a chance to look see it clearly and say ahah dont fck with me and was able to walk back in no problem lock door and i know i wont be sleeping tonight at all.
content.summary: I went outside and someone or something was flashing me in trees red orange globe

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend went outside to have a cigarette and called me outside that's when we saw it. to the southwest we saw blinking lights it was basically cigar shaped with red and white lights flashing in sequence.  it was no more than a 1000 feet up and about 3/4 of a mile from us. it hovered in place with no sound or other emissions we watched it for maybe 10 minutes then itccompletely vanished.
content.summary: Hovered in place flashing lights then completely vanished.
